KijiRestPlugin
public class StandardKijiRestPlugin
extends Object

Installs default KijiREST endpoints into the Dropwizard environment.

Method Detail

initialize

public void initialize(com.yammer.dropwizard.config.Bootstrap<KijiRESTConfiguration> bootstrap)
For every accessible plugin, this method is invoked when KijiRESTService initializes. Bootstraps the plugin. Often useful for adding asset bundles.

Specified by:
initialize in interface KijiRestPlugin
Parameters:
bootstrap - the service bootstrap

install

public void install(KijiClient kijiClient,
                    KijiRESTConfiguration configuration,
                    com.yammer.dropwizard.config.Environment environment)
For every accessible plugin, this method is invoked when KijiRESTService initializes. Creates and adds resources to the environment.

Specified by:
install in interface KijiRestPlugin
Parameters:
kijiClient - that this should use for connecting to Kiji.
configuration - of the KijiREST setup.
environment - of Dropwizard.

registerSerializers

public static void registerSerializers(com.yammer.dropwizard.json.ObjectMapperFactory mapperFactory)
Registers custom serializers with the Jackson ObjectMapper via DropWizard's ObjectMapperFactory. This is used by both the service initialization and the test setup method to ensure consistency between test and production.

Parameters:
mapperFactory - is the ObjectMapperFactory.
